code: import React from'react';import{Footer}from'./footer.js';import'./assets/styles/homepage.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import logo42 from'./assets/images/logo-42.png';import{isThemeSet}from'./choose_theme';import darklogo42 from'./assets/images/42-dark-logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const isLightTheme=isThemeSet();export function Homepage(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:isLightTheme?'mainContainerLight':'mainContainer',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{id:"topSide",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{id:"homePageTitle",children:"Web Serv"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"logo42",src:isLightTheme?darklogo42:logo42,alt:"logo-42"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"mainText",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"firstSentence",children:"Web Serv is a 42 project that consists in building a HTTP server from scratch."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"secondSentence",children:"It has to be powered in C++"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainBtn,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}export function MainBtn(){const[isActive,setIsActive]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const timer=setTimeout(()=>{setIsActive(true);},5000);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:isLightTheme?"mainButtonLight":"mainButton",className:isActive?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/actions",children:"Explore Now"})});}
